#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mem(arr,init) memset(arr,init,sizeof(arr))

using namespace std;


int dp[108][108][108][108];


int main()
{
	int i,j,k,t,n,m,a,b,c,x,y,z,l;
	int n1,n2,n3,n4;
	string s1,s2,s3,s4;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		mem(dp,0);
		cin>>s1>>s2>>s3>>s4;
		n1=s1.length(); n2=s2.length(); n3=s3.length(); n4=s4.length();
		for(i=1;i<=n1;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=n2;j++)
			{
				for(k=1;k<=n3;k++)
				{
					for(l=1;l<=n4;l++)
					{
						z=INT_MIN;
						//dp[i][j][k][l]
						if(s1[i-1]==s2[j-1] && s2[j-1]==s3[k-1] && s3[k-1]==s4[l-1])
						{
							dp[i][j][k][l]=dp[i-1][j-1][k-1][l-1]+1;
						}
						else
						{
							z=max(dp[i-1][j][k][l],dp[i][j-1][k][l]);
							z=max(z,dp[i][j][k-1][l]);
							z=max(z,dp[i][j][k][l-1]);
							dp[i][j][k][l]=z;
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	//	cout<<dp[n1][n2][n3][n4]<<" ";
		cout<<(n1+n2+n3+n4-4*dp[n1][n2][n3][n4])<<endl;
		
		
	}
	




	return 0;
}
